io.micronaut.email.sendgrid

Class SendgridEmailSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.email.sendgrid.SendgridEmailSender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.micronaut.core.naming.Named, AsyncTransactionalEmailSender<com.sendgrid.Request,com.sendgrid.Response>, TransactionalEmailSender<com.sendgrid.Request,com.sendgrid.Response>

    @Requires(beans={SendGridConfiguration.class,SendgridEmailComposer.class})
 @Named(value="sendgrid")
 @Singleton
public class SendgridEmailSender
extends java.lang.Object
implements TransactionalEmailSender<com.sendgrid.Request,com.sendgrid.Response>, AsyncTransactionalEmailSender<com.sendgrid.Request,com.sendgrid.Response>
    SendGrid implementation of TransactionalEmailSender and AsyncTransactionalEmailSender .
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Sergio del Amo
